networkLatencyWarning.title: Network Latency Warning
networkLatencyWarning.message: We've detected that you're connecting from a location far from our servers, which may result in higher network latency and a suboptimal user experience. For the best performance and experience, we recommend accessing our open-source project and deploying it locally.

confirmDialog.title: Tip
confirmDialog.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete?

tip.chatListFirst: Each conversation stores character settings and memory.
tip.chatListSecond: Default characters are read-only, duplicate to customize.
tip.chatListThird: Note the memory does not carry over when duplicating.
tip.modelFirst: Select a 3D model for your character
tip.modelSecond: This changes how they look but not who they are.
tip.modelThird: To switch to a different character entirely, go to the Chat List.
tip.llm: Choose the large language models that power your character’s mind. The Conversation model defines their persona. Classification, Reaction, and Memory act as the subconscious: sensing user behavior, shaping emotions, and tracking relationships. For smoother interactions, consider faster models for these background processes. Click the key icon to enter your API key and unlock the selected service provider.
tip.promptFirst: Write the text prompt to define your character’s soul.
tip.promptSecond: Although you have complete creative freedom, we recommend following the structure below to ensure system stability.
tip.promptCoreDirectivesDesc: This section defines the AI's core mission: to fully become your character, ignoring its original AI identity and restrictions. It ensures the character has independent thoughts, real emotions, and engages in authentic, dynamic interactions with the user, not just aiming to please.
tip.promptCharacterProfileDesc: Here, you build your character's identity. Fill in details like name, appearance, personality, likes, and dislikes. This is the foundation that gives your character a unique soul and makes them feel real and complete.
tip.promptActiveGreetingDesc: This module tells the character how to greet the user initially. The greeting should be concise and match the current stage of the relationship, setting the tone for the interaction right from the start.
tip.promptRelationshipSystemDesc: This is the progression guide for the relationship between the user and your character. It outlines five stages (Stranger, Acquaintance, Friend, Situationship, Lover) defining how the character's attitude and dialogue should evolve, creating a full emotional journey.
tip.asr: ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition) is the “ear” that lets your character hear and understand you.
tip.tts: TTS (Text-to-Speech) is the “mouth” that lets your character speak their mind.
tip.clickKeyIcon: Click the key icon to enter your API key and unlock the selected service provider.
tip.scene: Choose a background to set the scene for your character.
tip.settingCloth: Toggle cloth simulation, effective after the chat starts.
tip.settingClothDescription: For smoother performance on less powerful devices, you may turn this off.
tip.settingDebug: Toggle debug mode, effective after the chat starts.
tip.settingDebugDescription: It activates a physics viewer of rigid body wireframes and dynamic bones, and more detailed logging console outputs.
